mapper.select:
SELECT fragment.path,fragment.title,fragment.url,fragment.sort,fragment.create_id,fragment.gmt_create, fragment.cover,fragment.fragment_file_model_id, attribute.data AS data FROM thinkcms_fragment fragment LEFT JOIN thinkcms_fragment_attribute attribute ON attribute.fragment_id=fragment.id
fragment.id=#{id}

SELECT fragment.id,resource.file_full_path as cover,fragment.path,fragment.title,fragment.url,fragment.sort, fragment.fragment_file_model_id, fragment.gmt_create,attr.`data` FROM thinkcms_fragment_file_model file_model LEFT JOIN thinkcms_fragment fragment ON file_model.id=fragment.fragment_file_model_id LEFT JOIN thinkcms_fragment_attribute attr ON attr.fragment_id=fragment.id LEFT JOIN sys_resource resource ON resource.id=fragment.cover WHERE file_model.`code`=#{code} ORDER BY fragment.sort DESC
